name: Voting recommendation
description: Voting recommendations allow any organization to represent their expected outcome of a legislation voting.

name.name: Name
name.description: The name of this set of voting recommendations. Could be, for example, the name of the law or report on which voting occurs.

author.name: Author
author.description: The person or entity who wrote this recommendation.

timestamp.name: Creation timestamp
timestamp.description: The time at which this recommendation was edited, in seconds since the Epoch.

requester.name: Requester
requester.description: The requester of this recommendation, if different from the author.
